amendment.description: Relating to the State of Louisiana's Comprehensive Master Plan for a Sustainable Coast, and to improve a provision relating to dam optimization.

vote.text: Amendment SA 899 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 899 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S3401-3408) Relating to the State of Louisiana's Comprehensive Master Plan for a Sustainable Coast, and to improve a provision relating to dam optimization.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 899 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 899 proposed by Senator Boxer.
